thread.title: Sometimes Media Reports Are Way Out Of Things Sanie Darra
thread.title_full: Sometimes Media Reports Are Way Out Of Things Sanie Darra

title: Sometimes Media Reports Are Way Out Of Things Sanie Darra
text:
14:29 CET Sometimes Media Reports Are Way Out Of Things – Sanie Darra By El-Amisty Nobo ( [email protected] ) 
Communications Director of the Ghana Football Association (GFA) Ibrahim Sanie Darra has said that some media reports are sometimes blown out of proportion. 
Speaking to the media after the Black Stars vs. Canada friendly international match on Tuesday, Mr. Ibrahim Sanie said there’s no disaffection between the Black Stars players as its been reported by some media houses. 
“Let me say emphatically, there’s no disagreement in the Black Stars team. Players are united as ever, and we don’t have any problems at all,” he said. 
“If you had attended any of our training sessions you would have witnessed how close the players are. Sometimes some of the media reports are way out of things,” he added. 
Follow Amisty on twitter @ElAmistyNobo 
www.sports24gh.com
